org.spongepowered.api.block

Class BlockState.StateMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.block.BlockState.StateMatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Predicate<BlockState>
    Enclosing interface:
    BlockState

    public static final class BlockState.StateMatcher
extends Object
implements Predicate<BlockState>
    A BlockState matcher that will match various block states according to a pre-built list of BlockTraits and their values, such that not all BlockTraits contained in a BlockState must be matched. (Such as if a block state that contains 4 traits, and only 2 are wanting to be matched, then the other two traits may be variable).

    • Method Detail

      • matches

        public boolean matches(BlockState state)
        Gets a true return value if the provided BlockState sufficiently matches this matcher, such that the BlockType matches, and the pre-defined BlockTrait values match.
        Parameters:
        state - The block state in question
        Returns:
        True if the state sufficiently matches

      • getCompatibleStates

        public List<BlockState> getCompatibleStates()
        Gets a List of compatible BlockStates. Since all BlockStates are known in the initialization of a BlockType, the states are already deterministic and cannot change themselves.
        Returns:
        The list of compatible block states
